qsprpred.scorers package

Submodules

qsprpred.scorers.predictor module

predictors

Created by: Martin Sicho On: 06.06.22, 20:15

class qsprpred.scorers.predictor.Predictor(model, feature_calculators, scaler: SKLearnStandardizer, type: str, th=1, name=None, modifier=None)[source]

Bases: Scorer

static fromFile(base_dir, algorithm, target, type='CLS', th=1, scale=True, name='Predictor', modifier=None)[source]

Construct predictor from files with serialized model, feature calculator & scaler.

Parameters

  • base_dir – base directory with folder qspr/models/ containing the serialized mode, feature_descriptor and optionally scaler

  • algorithm – type of model

  • target – name of property to predict

  • type – regression or classification

  • scale – bool if true, apply feature scaling

  • th – if classification give activity threshold

  • name – name for predictor

  • modifier – score modifier

Returns

predictor

getKey()[source]

Return model identifier.

getScores(mols, frags=None)[source]

Return scores for the input molecules.

Parameters

  • mols – molecules to score

  • frags – input fragments

Returns

‘np.array’ of scores for “mols”

Return type

scores (numpy.ndarray)
